::Zardus::

Zardus recieves Wheeljack's and Hurricane's transmission, and looks 
over at Wolfgang.

"I will take a few bots with me and go get some supplies from a few 
ship wrecks. Can you mind the base while I'm gone?"

He then activates his comm, and sends a transmission to Hurricane and 
Wheeljack. "I have a task I need you two to help me with. Can you 
report to my position?"
